tool_description: The Entity Risk API accesses our risk intelligence data.
name: Entity Risk
title: Entity Risk

api_list.name: Audit
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves individual audit records. An audit record represents the request and response that was submitted using Sigma's API and it is used for traceability.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://entity-risk.p.rapidapi.com/v1/audit/e723887d-4e3b-42ee-820c-339602aaa72c"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-risk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://entity-risk.p.rapidapi.com/v1/audit/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-risk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sources
api_list.description: Lists the available Sigma Sources to search on. Sigma Sources are specific integrations which Sigma has constructed to impose structure to its various datasets. Use the name field as value to filter sources on.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://entity-risk.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-risk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Account Status
api_list.description: Check the status of this account (api key)
